Articles.Content: I know we already have Researchbodies which lets us discover worlds, but what we should really have is a mod that conceals planets and moons from the map screen until you enter the SOI of its parent body. In this mod for example at the start of a game, all the primary planets would be visible because the player starts within Kerbol SOI, Kerbins moons would also be visible because the player is still inside Kerbin SOI, but moons like gilly or laythe would be invisible until you reach their parent planet. Same with interstellar mods, planets are around other stars would be invisible until you the reach their parent star.

Have you read my ResearchBodies thread recently? That's exactly what I am working on. with WIP pictures and all..
